name: Eleblog – Elementor Blog And Magazine Addons
author: solverwp.com

sections.description:
Eleblog is an ultimate posts addon or element pack for the Elementor page builder. You can display the blog posts on the WordPress web site the way you want.

Live Demo | Upgrade to Pro! | Support

ELeblog – Elementor Magazine Demo (Pro)

  • Banner
  • Slider ( 3 Style )
  • Post Selector
  • Category Banner
  • Social Profile
  • Grid View
  • Latest Post ( 2 style )
  • Video Grid
  • Video Grid Two
  • Ads

ELeblog – Elementor BLog Demo (Pro)

  • Card Style
  • Grid Style
  • Category Filter
  • Post List Style
  • Post Slider
  • Image Style
  • Ajax Pagination
  • Normal Pagination
  • 22+ premade design
  • Unlimited color options
  • Unlimited typography options
  • Category Filter
  • Exclude Category
  • Tag Filter
  • Post title show/hide also length control
  • Content/ Excerpt show/hide with length.
  • Manage your ‘Read More’ text
  • Meta Control
  • Post Number control
  • Layout Control option
  • Popular post/Most viewed Post Display
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • Post Grid, Post Slider,Category Filter, Post List, Ajax Pagination
  • Update regularly
  • Pro Version Available
  • and more….

    • Easy to Use – No Coding Required

    You can use this plugin without any coding knowledge. It has every nessesary settings to change everythings easily. It’s has layout settings, color settings, conttent/title/meta settings and more.

    RERESPONSIVE & SEO FRIENDLY

    ELeblog is totally is completely responsive and SEO-friendly design. In every design it’s fully mobile optimized

    WORKING WITH ANY THEME

    It’s working with any theme. so you can use it on your website without no issue

    SUPER FAST PERFORMANCE

    We follow 100% WordPress Coding standard. So it’s loading super first and performs very well.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Let’s enjoy it
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any WordPress theme.

Can I Customize Color, Typography and Layout

Yes, You can easily change color,typoraphy and layout. Every necessary settings has this plugin.

Is this plugin totally free.

Yes, it’s totally free, But we also have premium version with more style and features.

Is this plugin compatable on latest wordpress and elementor version ?

Yes

Does it work with Elementor Pro?

yes
